title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias names.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset, the column names should be displayed as their alias names.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select a dataset. 
3. Double click on the column names in the expression builder. 
4. Verify that the displayed names are the alias names instead of the old column names.
